list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small waterfall, typically one of several that fall in stages down a steep rocky slope.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the waterfall raced down in a series of cascades
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thác nước chạy xuống trong một loạt thác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a process whereby something, typically information or knowledge, is successively passed on.
(of water) pour downward rapidly and in large quantities.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: water was cascading down the stairs
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nước được xếp tầng xuống cầu thang

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: arrange (a number of devices or objects) in a series or sequence.
